attributes.action: The Blood Transfusion Service, or any part of it, should not, under any circumstances be privatised
attributes.additional_details:
The Nathional health services and its unique services belongs to us and not any government.It was set up in 1948 to alleviate the suffering of ordainary people and to ensure that every person irrespective of wealth had access to medical services.

The new NHS bill alters the contract between us the public and its owners and lets in competition or profit making.

We must all ensure by signing this bill that all of the NHS services are kept free at the point of delivery and that companies are not able to cream of the prfitable parts and deny access to the peple who own it or that as is happening now services are being cut.
